name: Impulse - GMTK Game Jam
description: Impulse is a game made for the 2017 Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam. You control a spaceship using only one button. Click the left mouse to dash and keep holding it to move around. Hit enemies with the wash from your thrusters to weaken their armor, and ram into them to destroy them. Don't get shot more than twice in a row and have fun!
